title: Zalmonah
verses:
1. Stand th'omnipotent decree! Jesus
Master's and we wait to see, And
Let those pond'rous orbs descend, And
Jehovah's will be done! Let this earth disgrind us into dust.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Expresses submission to God's omnipotent decree and willingness to accept the cosmic changes that accompany the end times
